mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tSheet_sub WHERE sheetID2 IN ( SELECT sheetID FROM tSheet WHERE carSubmitTel = #{carSubmitTel} AND DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND (sheetSS = #{sheetSS} and sheetSS2 = (SELECT UuserID FROM tsitePW WHERE Userid= #{carSubmitTel}) OR sheetSS2 IS NULL OR sheetSS2=0) )
mapper.insert: insert into tSheet_sub (fromsite, item, Qty, Qtyup, Rem, sheetID2, tosite, sheetsubSS, sheetsubSS2, writeridx2 ) values ( #{fromsite}, #{item}, #{Qty}, #{Qtyup}, #{Rem}, #{sheetID2}, #{tosite}, #{sheetsubSS}, #{sheetsubSS2}, #{writeridx2} )
mapper.select: select sheetID2 from tSheet_sub where sheetsubID=#{sheetsubID}
